page.title: 19ATTITUDES IN MADDERTY
page.content: People were sorry that the only shop and Post Office in St. David's closed. The high cost of petrol bothers people here as we have to travel 7 miles to the nearest shops. Parents are worried about bills, electricity bills,telephone bills,TV licences. The houses here were re-valued for Rates and most people feel they are too high. Farmers are worried about the weather, as usual.They want rain just now and then sun to ripen the crops. Many rural schools in this area have closed down and everyone is very sad about this. Everyone has been upset about the famine in Ethiopia and have raised money to help.
